data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Pinus sylvestris (Scotch pine) from sample PYHHAK-121

Exposition E, Slope 2 deg, Geology: Moräne sandig, Granit, av. Tree height 30 m, Tree cover 95%, Shrub cover 25%, Herb cover 60%, Moss cover 100%, Vegatation type: Myrtillo-Pineetum, Film number: 536A
